name: withdraw_assets
body: let seeds = & [ctx . accounts . pool . destination . key () . as_ref () , & [ctx . accounts . pool . bump]] ;
let amount = ctx . accounts . vault . amount ;
let tx = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . destination . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . pool . to_account_info () , } ;
transfer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () . with_signer (& [seeds]) , amount) ? ;
ctx . accounts . state . counter = ctx . accounts . state . counter . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("Case 901: transferred {} (counter {})" , amount , ctx . accounts . state . counter) ;

fields.name: pool
fields.attribute: # [account (has_one = vault , has_one = destination , seeds = [destination . key () . as_ref ()] , bump = pool . bump)]

fields.name: state
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"state" , pool . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , payer = user , space = 8 + 8)]
